author: 界面新闻
title: 深圳：到2026年底建成"1+5+4"低空经济总部研发测试总体布局 产值规模突破1300亿元 _ 东方财富网
text:
7月31日，深圳市发改委发布《深圳市低空基础设施高质量建设方案（2024—2026年）》，其中提到，到2026年底，建成“1+5+4”（ 低空经济 大科学装置1个、 低空经济 运行试验区5个、测试场4个） 低空经济 总部研发测试总体布局。围绕 无人机 关键系统和零部件、整机制造、地面保障装备等关键环节，形成一批全球领军的低空研发制造企业， 专精特新 “小巨人”、制造业单项冠军、隐形冠军等企业国内领先。产业集聚发展水平显著提升，产值规模突破1300亿元。到2026年底，建成10个低空经济产业园区和2个特色产业园区，覆盖技术研发、生产制造、营销展示等业态。低空经济链上企业相互合作与跨行业协同规模显著提升，飞控算法、高能量密度 电池 、低功耗主控芯片、高性能轻量化材料、复杂环境感知等关键核心技术取得重大突破，实现低空飞行器产业链核心技术与关键零部件供应的自主可控。
　　到2026年底，建成低空起降点1200个以上，开通载人、载货飞行等各类低空商业航线1000条以上，直升机、eVTOL起降设施1公里半径覆盖建成区面积比例突破50%，“2小时同城、4小时跨城”低空快送服务覆盖人口占全市人口比例超过70%，三甲医院、血液中心（血站）覆盖率超过50%，城市治理起降场3公里半径范围内实现全市公园、河道、水库、岸线等巡检全覆盖，载人飞行、物流运输、低空观光、航空运动、飞行培训、电力巡线、港口巡检、航拍测绘、农林植保等领域实现商业化应用。到2026年底，建成全球首个低空智能融合系统（SILAS），低空通信、导航、监视、气象监测等服务保障体系实现全覆盖，行业领先的低空算力平台投入使用，涵盖空域划设与流量管理、飞行计划审批、航空器管理服务等业务的现代化低空治理体系全面建成，形成可复制、可推广的一站式解决方案，彰显“深圳低空”全球品牌效应。
（文章来源：界面新闻）
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->business strategy and marketing

title: SICK! Pope appoints Fernandez (author of The Art of Kissing) who DISBELIEVES child victims of SEXUAL ABUSE
text:

author: IANS
title: Ayodhya airport to be named after Maharishi Valmiki now
text: Ayodhya airport to be named after Maharishi Valmiki now The airport is being named after the legendary poet Valmiki, who is celebrated as the author of the epic Ramayana. LUCKNOW: The airport in Ayodhya, which will be inaugurated on Saturday, has been renamed "Maharishi Valmiki International Airport Ayodhya Dham". The airport is being named after the legendary poet Valmiki, who is celebrated as the author of the epic Ramayana. The airport was earlier called the "Maryada Purshottam Shri Ram Ayodhya International Airport". The newly-constructed airport will be inaugurated by Prime Minister Narendra Modi on December 30, days before the consecration ceremony of the Ram Mandir in Ayodhya. The grand consecration ceremony will be held on January 22, 2024. On the day it is inaugurated, the first flights will be operated by IndiGo and Air India Express. The two airlines have already announced flights from Delhi, Mumbai and Ahmedabad to Ayodhya, commencing in January 2024. The cost of the first phase of construction for the airport is estimated to be nearly Rs 1,450 crore. The new terminal building, spanning 6,500 square metre, is designed to accommodate 600 peak-hour passengers, with an annual handling capacity of 10 lakh passengers. Sources said that the second phase of development will include the construction of a new terminal building spanning 50,000 square metre, capable of handling 3,000 passengers during peak hours and 60 lakh passengers annually.

organizations.name: maryada purshottam shri ram ayodhya international airport
maharishi valmiki international airport ayodhya dham

author: beIN SPORTS description!
title: Tottenham Suffer Setback Against Brighton | beIN SPORTS
text:
Tottenham Suffer Setback Against Brighton After a positive streak of three consecutive victories, Tottenham experienced a disheartening loss against Brighton. The London-based team faltered in a disappointing first half, where Brighton secured a commanding 2-0 lead within just 22 minutes, with an additional stunning goal from Pervís Estupiñán that stifled any comeback efforts (4-2).
Despite a more promising second half for Tottenham, featuring goal-scoring opportunities and overturned plays, the team couldn't fully turn the tide. Defensive errors and a penalty conceded by Lo Celso exacerbated the situation, resulting in a final score of 4-2 in favor of Brighton.
Tottenham's inconsistency was once again laid bare, raising doubts about their ability to contend for the Premier League title this season. The absence of Harry Kane and a six-point gap from the top spot underscore the challenges facing the team. Despite holding onto European spots, the defeat raises questions about Spurs' ongoing performance in upcoming competitions.

author: Steve LeMaster Sports Writer
title: Lady Dores hold off Lady Eagles, 54-46 - NewsBreak
text:
By Steve LeMaster Sports Writer ,
22 minutes ago HAZARD — Perry Central pushed past Leslie County 54-46 in a 54th District girls’ basketball game on Friday, Jan. 17. Productive Perry Central shot 45.0 percent (18 of 40) from the field. The Lady Commodores made four of 16 three-point field goal attempts, shooting 28.6 percent from beyond the arc. Read full article
